data.name: Rimebeard Demo
data.detailed_description:
Rimebeard Demo




Rimebeard is a grid-based puzzlegame where you create, remove and push blocks of ice strategically to extinguish all flames in each level. Navigate through the level methodically and use various other elements such as rocks, crates, pipes and more to achieve your goal and avoid getting stuck between a flame and a hard place. 70 levels are waiting to be solved in this game based on a NES classic.
data.about_the_game:
Rimebeard Demo




Rimebeard is a grid-based puzzlegame where you create, remove and push blocks of ice strategically to extinguish all flames in each level. Navigate through the level methodically and use various other elements such as rocks, crates, pipes and more to achieve your goal and avoid getting stuck between a flame and a hard place. 70 levels are waiting to be solved in this game based on a NES classic.
data.short_description: Create, remove and push blocks of ice strategically to extinguish all flames in each level. Use various other elements like rocks, crates, pipes and more to your advantage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD with latest drivers, at least 512MB dedicated video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion 10.7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD with latest drivers, at least 512MB dedicated video memory, support for OpenGL 2.0+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu LTS
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD with latest drivers, at least 512MB dedicated video memory, support for OpenGL 2.0+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
